snoopy.blindnote: It is predicted to guide the 2'O-ribose methylation of 28S rRNA A1521 and G1612. Methylation of A1521 is also guided by SNORD77. SNORD77 and SNORD80 share same host gene. (20100707末安)snoRNABaseを参考にsequenceを5'側から2nt伸ばし、3'側から2nt伸ばした,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Smith, C. M., and Steitz, J. A. (1998). Classification of gas5 as a multi-small-nucleolar-RNA (snoRNA) host gene and a member of the 5'-terminal oligopyrimidine gene family reveals common features of snoRNA host genes. Mol Cell Biol 18, 6897-6909.
